pr_title: [2.19.x] DDF-5495 refactor extension for Table Export behavior

timeline.bodyText: ❓ Do we still need EndpointUtil in this class?

replies.bodyText: yeah other functions from endpointUtil are used https://github.com/codice/ddf/pull/5806/files/1777c3ac350e61be0512a170ec862bb5b8ba86e3#diff-cc5f97af83867437776fddd13f08d36bR124

timeline.bodyText: ❓ How about CqlQueries and CqlQueriesImpl instead? It's minor but this will surprise anyone not familiar with Java conventions.
timeline.author: Lambeaux

timeline.bodyText: 👍 Nice. Splitting stuff up also makes wiring things together for unit / component tests a lot easier. We were able to kill two arguments here.
